name: Anthony Towns
cooked: There’s an announcement tag that’s been used for software releases in the Implementation category. For protocol improvements, might be better to make a post with the sort of content you’d present at a conference, rather than just an announcement though? In general, post where you think is best, and it can be moved later if it turns out there’s somewhere better (can be flagged “off-topic” to encourage such a move; vs “spam” if it’s inappropriate for the site as a whole).
topic_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
topic_html_title: Where to post information about new protocol releases?
raw: There's an #announcement tag that's been used for software releases in the #implementation category. For protocol improvements, might be better to make a post with the sort of content you'd present at a conference, rather than just an announcement though? In general, post where you think is best, and it can be moved later if it turns out there's somewhere better (can be flagged "off-topic" to encourage such a move; vs "spam" if it's inappropriate for the site as a whole).
